priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire Fatigue Severity Scale Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C113850

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Fatigue Severity Scale Test Code Terminology

name: Fatigue Severity Scale Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Fatigue Severity Scale Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Fatigue Severity Scale Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - My motivation is lower when I am fatigued.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Motivation is Lower When Fatigued

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - Exercise brings on my fatigue.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Exercise Brings on My Fatigue

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - I am easily fatigued.
Fatigue Severity Scale - Fatigue interferes with my physical functioning.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Fatigue Interferes With Physical Functioning

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - Fatigue causes frequent problems for me.
Fatigue Severity Scale - My fatigue prevents sustained physical functioning.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Fatigue Prevents Sustained Physical Functioning

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - Fatigue interferes with carrying out certain duties and responsibilities.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Fatigue Interferes With Carrying Out Duties

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - Fatigue is among my three most disabling symptoms.
terms.preferredTerm: FSS - Fatigue is Among Most Disabling Symptoms

terms.definition: Fatigue Severity Scale - Fatigue interferes with my work, family, or social life.
